result.execSummary:
The defendant Justan R Hofer was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 3rd Degree Sexual Assault, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Any cash bond to be applied to costs and restitution. 
If probation or extended supervision is allowed to expire or is revoked with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge and provide current financial information.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for any balances due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.  Attorney Fees To Be Determined.  Probation does NOT collect attorney fees.

Must have no contact with the victims in this case. 
Must have no unsupervised contact with juvenile females.

Must complete any and all evaluations, counseling, treatment and follow-up recommended by Probation Agent. Must undergo a psycho-sexual evaluation and comply with any recommendations. Must register as a sex offender. Must submit DNA sample and pay the surcharge.

Per C-31. To be determined.
12/18/15 AMENDED: COURT ORDERS RESTITUTION TO BE SET AT $0.00.

Defendant Justan R Hofer in court with attorney Lester H Liptak.  Defendant Justan R Hofer in custody.  Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
THIS COVERS 14CF406 and 15CF60. 
14CF406: Defendant pleads guilty to count 2. Court accepts the plea and finds the Defendant guilty. 
Counts 1, 3 and 4 are dismissed and read-in. 

15CF60: State moves to amend count 1 to third degree sexual assault 940.225(3) a class G felony. Court amends count 1.  Defendant pleads guilty to count 1. Court accepts the plea and finds the defendant guilty to the amended count 1. 
Counts 2, 3 and 4 are dimissed and read in. 

PSI ordered on both files. Psychosexual evaluation is to be prepared by Dr. Harland Heinz as part of the PSI. Bond continues. 
JAIL FAXED  Sentencing hearing scheduled for September 22, 2015 at 03:30 pm.
